snippet: A member of a white supremacist gang was arrested and another was being sought for questioning on Friday in the death of Colorado’s prisons chief.
abstract: James Lohr, member of a white supremacist gang, is arrested and another member is being sought for questioning in death of Colorado’s prisons chief Tom Clements.
lead_paragraph: A member of a white supremacist gang was arrested and another was being sought for questioning on Friday in the death of Colorado’s prisons chief.

headline.main: Colorado: One of 2 Tied to Killing Suspect Is in Custody
headline.print_headline: Colorado: One of 2 Tied To Killing Suspect Is In Custody
